title: Reasons for European predominance in world economy

content.question: Most world historians would agree that the key to European predominance in the world economy during the nineteenth and early twentieth centuries was

choices.label: Spanish control of New World silver

topic.text: 5.4: Industrialization Spreads in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
